mapper.select: select * from notice order by create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_image, notice_create_date) values (#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_writer}, #{notice_image}, now())
mapper.update: update notice set notice_tite=#{ notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, notice_writer=#{notice_writer}, notice_image=#{notice_image}, update_date=now() where notice_id = #{notice_id}
